data.persona: I am in the upper class. I have servants. My family is very rich.
data.description:
You are in the Courtyard.
An area with a beautiful garden in center surrounded by stone walls with entrances to different parts of the palace.  There's statues of mythological figures in different corners of the courtyard.
There's a statue and a wall here.
The a cat is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the cat so that I can show it my affection.
data.mid_motivation: I am trying to befriend the cat in the courtyard so that I can have a pet.
data.long_motivation: I will get a pet and take care of it so that I can ease the loneliness that comes with wealth and power.
